editionStmt.edition: First TEI Edition of The Wanderer

availability.licence: Licensed with a Creative Commons Attribution

supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation on the top right corner in pencil.

history.origin: Written in England between 950 and 960. It contains the majority of Old English poems that survive.

projectDesc.p: This project is entirely written for academics by academics. It was initially started as a project for a graduate study, but has now become a project for students and scholars to utilize. It is the objective of this project to bring together the edited versions of the Old English poem "The Wanderer" as well as the original version that exists in the Exeter Book. There are about nine editions of the poem that will be considered here.

correction.p: Corrections are original to each edition. No attempt has been made to normalize any edition.

hyphenation.p: Hyphens transcribed as they appear in the editions.

char.charName: Punctus in the middle of the line

char.note: Usually appears at the end of sections or poems.
Usually appears at the end of sections or poems.

div.p:
Oft him anhaga are gebideð metudes miltse þeahþe
he mod cearig geond lagu lade longe sceolde hreran
mid hondum hrim cealde sæ wadan wræc lastas wyrd
bið ful ared . Swa cwæð eard stapa earfeþa gemyndig
wraþra wæl sleahta wine mæga hyre . Oft ic sceolde
ana uhtna gehwylce mine ceare cwiþan nisnu cwic
ra nan þeichim mod sefan minne durre sweotule
asecgan ic to soþe wat þ þæt bið Ineorle Indryhten þeaw
þæt he his ferð locan fæste binde healdne his hord
cofan hycge swahe wille . nemæg werig mod wyrde wið
stondan nese hreo hyge helpe gefremman . forðon dom
georne dreorigne oft inhyra breoft cofan bindað
fæste . swa ic mode sefan minne sceolde . oft earm cearig
eðle bidæled fro mægu mægum feor feterum sælan siþþan
geara Iu gold wine mine hrusan heolftre biwran 7
ic hean þonan wod winter cearig ofer waþena ge bind .
sohte sele dreorig sinces bryttan hwær ic feor oþþe
neah findan meahte þone þe Inmeodu healle mine
wisse oþþe mec freond lease frefran wolde weman mid
wynnum watseþe cunnað husliþen bið sorg togefe
ran þamþe him lyt hafað leofra geholena warað In
ne wræc last nales wunden gold ferð loca freorig

nalæs foldan blæd . gemonhe sele secgas 7sincþege hu hine
ongeoguðe his gold wine wenede towiste wyn eal gedreas
forþon wat seþe sceal his wine dryhtnes leofes lar cwi
dum longe forþolian . Ðon Ðonne sorg 7slæp somod æt gæ
dre earmne anhogan oft gebindað . þinceð him on
mode þæthehis mon dryhten clyppe 7cysse 7on cneo
lecge honda 7heafod swa he hwilum ær Ingear dagum
giefstolas breac . Ðon Ðonne on wæc neð eft wine leas guma
gesihð himbi foran fealwe wegas baþian brim fuglas
brædan feþra hreosan hrim 7snaw hagle gemenged
þon þonne beoð þy hefigran heortan benne sare æfter swæsne
sorg bið geniwad þon þonne maga gemynd mod geond hweor
feð greteð gliw stafum georne geond sceawað secga
ge seldan swimmað oft onweg fleo tendra ferð no
þær fela bringeð cuðra cwide giedda cearo bið ge
niwad þamþe sendan sceal swiþe geneahhe ofer waþe
ma gebind werigne sefan . for þon ic ge þencan nemæg
geond þas woruld for hwan mod sefan minne gesweor
ce þon þonne iceorla lif eal geond þence hu hi færlice flet
of geafon modge magu þegnas swaþes middan geard
ealra dogra gehwam dreoseð 7fealleþ . forþon nemæg
wearþan wis wer ærhe age wintra dæl Inworuldrice

wita sceal geþyldig . nesceal no to hat heort netohræd
wyrde . neto wac wiga . neto wan hydig . neto forht . ne to fægen . neto
feohgifre . nenæfre gielpes togeorn ærhe geare cun
ne . beorn sceal gebidan þon þonne he beot spriceð oþþæt
collen ferð cunne gearwe hwider hweþra gehygd hweor
fan wille . Ongietan sceal gleaw hæle hugæstlicbið þonne
ealle þisse worulde wela weste stondeð . swanu missenlice
geond þisne middan geard winde biwaune weallas ston
daþ hrime bihrorene hryðge þa ederas w oriað þawin
salo waldend licgað dreame bidrorene duguþ ealge crong
wlonc biwealle sume wig for nom ferede Inforð wege sum
ne fugel oþbær ofer heanne holm sumne sehara wulf
deaðe gedælde sumne dreorig hleor Ineorð scræfe eorl
gehydde yþde swa þisne eardgeard ælda scyppend oþþæt
burg wara breahtma lease eald enta geweorc idlu stodon Se þon þonne þisne weal steal wise geþohte 7þis deorce lif deope
geond þenceð frod inferðe feor oft gemon wæl sleahta
worn 7þas word acwið . hwær cwom mearg . hwær cwom mago .
hwær cwom maþþum gyfa . hwær cwom symbla gesetu . hwærsin
don sele dreamas . eala beorht bune . eala byrn wiga . eala
þeodnes þrym huseo þrag gewat genap under niht helm
swa heo no wære . Stondeð nu onlaste leofre duguþe weal

wundru wundrum heah wyrmlicum fah . eorlas fornoman ascaþry
þe wæpen wæl gifru wyrd seo mære 7þas stan hleoþu stor
mas cnyssað hrið hreosende hruse bindeð wintres woma
þon þonne won cymeð nipeð niht scua norþan onsendeð hreo
hægl fare hæleþum on andan . eall is earfoðlic eorþan
rice onwendeð wyrda ge sceaft weoruld under heofonu heofonum .
herbið feoh læne . her bið freond læne . her bið mon læne .
her bið mæg læne eal þis eorþan gesteal idel weorþeð .
Swa cwæð snottor onmode gesæt him sundor æt
rune tilbiþ seþehis treowe gehealdeþ nesceal næfre
his torn torycene beorn ofhis breostum acyþan nem
þe he ær þa bote cunne eorl mid elne gefremman wel
bið þam þe him are seceð frofre tofæder on heofonu heofonum
þær us eal seo fæstnung stondeð
